text: The Regius Professorship of Humanity, formerly the Regius Professorship of Classics, is a Regius Chair in classics at the University of Aberdeen. ==List of Regius Professors of Humanity== * 1886–1911: William Mitchell Ramsay * 1911–1937: Alexander Souter * 1938–1952: Peter Noble * 1952–1979: William Smith Watt * 2007–2017: Jane Stevenson * 2020–present: John Behr ==References== Humanity Category:Professorships in classics Category:Professorships at the University of Aberdeen
title: Regius Professor of Humanity
